channel.title: Last-mile on hack(pravj)

item.title: How will a drone deliver your food?
item.description: The title looks like a good interview question. So here is the right follow-up question, Why? Let’s list down the contributing factors and follow up from there. Have you ever been in a situation when you’re (hungry) about to place a food order and the application is showing you 40+ minutes to deliver? It’s a complete turn-off. You start to think of some other food item that will be delivered early.
